statements: SELECT * FROM moisture_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, soil_moisture_level FROM moisture_sensors WHERE soil_moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM moisture_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM moisture_sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%';
SELECT sensor_id, location, soil_moisture_level FROM moisture_sensors WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM moisture_sensors WHERE location = 'Garden' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(soil_moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM moisture_sensors GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(soil_moisture_level) > 50;
SELECT * FROM moisture_sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY soil_moisture_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, soil_moisture_level, timestamp FROM moisture_sensors WHERE soil_moisture_level < 30.0 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations, MAX(soil_moisture_level) AS max_moisture FROM moisture_sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE sensor_id = 'ee6c8d4c-694b-47e7-8f7d-4c1d6e0f3c11';
SELECT moisture_level, location FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE location = 'Greenhouse' ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE moisture_level > 60 AND location LIKE 'Garden%';
SELECT * FROM SensorLogs WHERE reading BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading FROM SensorLogs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-12-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2023-01-31';
SELECT * FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE sensor_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE location = 'Greenhouse' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM MoistureSensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_moisture > 50;
SELECT s.sensor_id, l.reading, l.log_timestamp FROM SensorLogs l JOIN MoistureSensorData s ON l.sensor_id = s.sensor_id ORDER BY l.log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT location, MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture FROM MoistureSensorData GROUP BY location HAVING max_moisture < 75;
SELECT * FROM MoistureSensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, moisture_level FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT status_id, sensor_id, status, last_update FROM SensorStatus;
SELECT * FROM MoistureSensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, soil_type, moisture_level FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, moisture_level, timestamp FROM MoistureSensorData WHERE soil_type = 'clay' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -80.0;
SELECT sensor_name, status, last_update FROM SensorStatus INNER JOIN MoistureSensorData ON SensorStatus.sensor_id = MoistureSensorData.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, moisture_level FROM sensors WHERE location='Lab';
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, reading_time, moisture_level FROM readings WHERE reading_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, moisture_level FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, longitude, latitude FROM locations WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT sensor_name, moisture_level FROM sensors WHERE moisture_level > 3.00 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level FROM moisture_sensors;
SELECT temperature, location FROM moisture_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, moisture_level FROM soil_conditions WHERE soil_type='Clay' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_id, installation_date FROM sensor_metadata WHERE manufacturer='SensorCo' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level, temperature, timestamp FROM moisture_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM soil_conditions WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT sensor_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM sensor_alerts WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, manufacturer, installation_date FROM sensor_metadata ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
